Summary: Telecommunications Service of the Avila City Council (Landline, Mobile, Data, Internet and Associated Services) Distributed in 3 Lots. Description: In line with technological evolution and the principles established in the Digitalization Plan for Public Administrations and the National Cybersecurity Strategy, the trend in public sector corporate networks is oriented towards architectures based on separate and isolated networks, through protocols that run on Layer-3, such as SD-WAN, to create convergent communications services that allow:<br> - Increase operational efficiency and reduce management costs.<br> - Incorporate intelligent and proactive traffic management, especially through application of advanced analytics and artificial intelligence techniques.<br> - Facilitate native integration with perimeter security systems and operations centers (SOC).<br> - Allow the use of hybrid links (fiber, 4G/5G, Internet, etc.) guaranteeing the high availability of services.<br> - Ensure scalability and flexibility when opening new headquarters or launching new municipal services.<br> In the field of interconnection of headquarters, the Avila City Council intends an even more evolved and robust approach, replacing networks based on SD-WAN with networks Layer-2 with the ability to transport VLANs based on the 802.1Q protocol.<br> One of the foundations of this requirement is not to lose benefits, such as the extremely low latency currently enjoyed, which characterizes campus networks or metropolitan networks, consti.... Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-22. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: LOCAL GOVERNMENT BOARD OF THE AVILA CITY COUNCIL
output.Summary: Telecommunications Service of the Avila City Council (Landline, Mobile, Data, Internet and Associated Services) Distributed in 3 Lots
output.Description: In line with technological evolution and the principles established in the Digitalization Plan for Public Administrations and the National Cybersecurity Strategy, the trend in public sector corporate networks is oriented towards architectures based on separate and isolated networks, through protocols that run on Layer-3, such as SD-WAN, to create convergent communications services that allow:<br> - Increase operational efficiency and reduce management costs.<br> - Incorporate intelligent and proactive traffic management, especially through application of advanced analytics and artificial intelligence techniques.<br> - Facilitate native integration with perimeter security systems and operations centers (SOC).<br> - Allow the use of hybrid links (fiber, 4G/5G, Internet, etc.) guaranteeing the high availability of services.<br> - Ensure scalability and flexibility when opening new headquarters or launching new municipal services.<br> In the field of interconnection of headquarters, the Avila City Council intends an even more evolved and robust approach, replacing networks based on SD-WAN with networks Layer-2 with the ability to transport VLANs based on the 802.1Q protocol.<br> One of the foundations of this requirement is not to lose benefits, such as the extremely low latency currently enjoyed, which characterizes campus networks or metropolitan networks, consti...

The Associated Services May Include, Among Others, Implementation, Installation, Configuration, Customization, parameterization, data migration, as well as technical support for the resolution of inquiries and incidents. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: BASE-REVENUE MANAGEMENT. Summary: Implementation Service of the Massive Banking Procedure (Exp. 2025/97-Gec). Description: Description of the service: The object of the contract is the implementation service of communication with the banking sector for the management of payments and the communication of financial information; in accordance with the characteristics specified in the technical specifications (PPT). BASE-Management d'Ingressos offers councils the service of managing and collecting different types of debts and, in order to carry out this service, it is necessary to maintain communication with the different banking entities to exchange information. This communication process is carried out through exchange of electronic files in different formats, depending on the type of management that is being carried out. Specifically, we are talking about the following types of file: - Notebook 60 (Q60): Used for the communication by the bank of collection information and other municipal income, for make it easier for taxpayers to pay taxes.- Booklet 43 (Q43): Used for the transmission of bank statements of current accounts.- Booklet 72 (Q72): Used for communication by the bank of changes in direct debits. Tender Value: 96828.16. Currency: EUR. Published Date: 2025-11-04. Closing Date: 2025-11-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Corrective, Evolutionary, Adaptive, Preventive and Perfective Maintenance Services on the Computer Systems of Structural Information and Digital Identity of the Ministry of Education.. Description: The Ministry of Education currently has developed and operating a set of applications, components and databases that make up the basic software infrastructures that support the centralized academic management application of educational centers (STILUS) and information to families (STILUS-Families), to the main educational platforms that provide Internet support to the educational community (Education Portal, Virtual Classrooms, Microsoft Office 365) and to different management processes of the Ministry.<br> These infrastructures are:<br> • Information core database structure.<br> • Digital identity infrastructure (Authentication and Security).<br> • Unified web work environments.<br> These infrastructures are essential for the operation in the multiple areas of non-university education management to be viable, to have the capacity to offer Internet services to families through different platforms, automate the assignment of user permissions and access to applications, as well as to deploy corporate ICT services in public educational centers (Internet browsing, corporate WIFI, management of the client position, security management, educational CAU.<br> Currently, the Ministry of Education has a contract in force to have external support from companies specialized in the development of these maintenance tasks (A2022/000230) that ends next month. ab.... Description: Description of the service: The object of the contract is the maintenance of the HP multifunction equipment printing fleet of Sant Adrià de Besòs Town Council. This maintenance will be carried out under the modality of price per copy and effective impression, of all teams present in the table presented in point 3 of this document. The main objectives to be achieved are the following: Keep the fleet of printers, multifunction equipment and plotters in proper working order, including the replacement of consumables, in all City Hall offices, where the devices referred to in the table are located. Detailed monthly billing with cost per actual printed page, distinguishing by equipment model, color, including old meter and meter read in the time to issue invoice. Preventive and corrective maintenance service in-situ of the park. - Replacement of the equipment due to breakdown. In case of not being able to repair a piece of equipment, the successful tenderer will provide a piece of equipment with similar characteristics until the end of the contract. The list of equipment to be maintained will be:- 10 equipment in the list were acquired new in December 2018, currently under a support and maintenance contract that ends on 12/31/2025.- 24 equipment were acquired new in December 2021, currently under a support and maintenance contract that ends on 12/31/2025.- 6 pieces of equipment that were acquired in December 2022, currently under a maintenance contract that ends on 12/31/2026, and which will have to enter .... input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: FUNDACIÓN MIGUEL SERVET. Summary: Pre-Commercial Procurement (Pcp) of Innovative and Sustainable Solutions to Treat Hospital and Healthcare System Wastewater - Theresa Pcp. Description: In preparation for the THERESA PCP, an Open Market Consultation (OMC) will be held between 22 December 2025 and 28 February 2026, aimed at engaging potential suppliers, research institutions and other stakeholders to inform and refine the procurement strategy and related functional and technical specifications. Activities foreseen include: Launch of the OMC (22 December 2025) with public announcement and registration; in January 2026, local and online events are planned in Spain, the Netherlands, Belgium, Estonia and Poland to present the project scope, requirements and PCP procedure; company pitch sessions; an online Request for Information (RFI) via EU Survey; a Q&A mechanism and matchmaking tool to support networking; bilateral meetings with suppliers; and a final event (26 February 2026) presenting results and next steps. All documents will be available in English. Any changes or updates to the OMC schedule, content, or documentation will be announced and published in a timely manner on the THERESA PCP project website: (www.theresa-pcp.eu/omc). <br> Doc Title: Pre-Commercial Procurement (PCP) of innovative and sustainable solutions to treat Hospital and Healthcare System Wastewater - THERESA PCP <br> Contract Type: services. Tender Value: 2787925. Currency: EUR. Published Date: 2025-10-31. Closing Date: 2025-12-15. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: FUNDACIÓN MIGUEL SERVET
output.Summary: Pre-Commercial Procurement (Pcp) of Innovative and Sustainable Solutions to Treat Hospital and Healthcare System Wastewater - Theresa Pcp

All documents will be available in English. Any changes or updates to the OMC schedule, content, or documentation will be announced and published in a timely manner on the THERESA PCP project website: (www.theresa-pcp.eu/omc). <br> Doc Title: Pre-Commercial Procurement (PCP) of innovative and sustainable solutions to treat Hospital and Healthcare System Wastewater - THERESA PCP <br> Contract Type: services

input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: BASE-REVENUE MANAGEMENT. Summary: Implementation Service of the New Third-Party Debt Application (Exp. 2025/93-Gec). Description: Description of the service: The object of the contract is the implementation service of the new third-party debt application, in accordance with the characteristics specified in the technical specifications (PPT). BASE-Income Management offers councils the management service and voluntary and executive collection. With this contract, the councils themselves will be able to know if a person owes them an executive debt, without having to intervene with BASE-Gestio d'Ingressos staff. This request will be massive and the town hall, using a form, will enter a file with the format of AEAT model 997: Embargo of budgetary payments from other public administrations. Obtaining tax certificates from third parties. Personal Income Tax. BASE computer systems, through deferred tasks, will work this one document and a new document will be generated with the requested data and this will be available to the town hall.. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: CONSORCI DE SALUT I D-ATENCIÓ SOCIAL DE CATALUNYA. Summary: Pre-Commercial Procurement of an Innovative Systemic Sustainability Transition Solution for Health Care Organisations (Suhco). Description: Procurement will take the form of pre-commercial procurement (PCP), where R&D service contracts will be awarded in parallel to different R&D providers in a phased approach. This will allow alternative, competing solutions to be compared. Each selected operator will receive a framework contract covering three R&D phases. The three phases are: Solution design, prototype development, original development and validation and testing of a limited volume of the first products or services. After each phase, interim evaluations are conducted to select the best of the competing solutions. The contractors with the best value for money will be offered a specific contract for the next phase. The selected operators will retain ownership of the intellectual property rights (IPRs) they generate during the PCP and will be able to use them to exploit the full market potential of the solutions developed. All interested operators are invited to take part in the upcoming open market consultation (regardless of their geographic location , the size or governance structure of their organisation). The open market consultation will be organised in the form of a series of meetings. It will provide you with an overview of the procurement objectives, the PCP process and the main clauses of the contract. You will also have the opportunity to ask questions. The first series of meetings will be held online or hybrid by each of the procurers mentioned under Section I.1). During those meetings, the procurers .... Tender Value: 2260980. Currency: EUR. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: COUNCIL OF L'ARBOC. Summary: Tender for the Maintenance of Electronic Locks for Cal Freixas Facilities. Description: Description of the service: The City Council currently has, in the Can Freixas department, electronic locks for restricted access to the offices where municipal administrative management is carried out. However, expanding this deployment to other dependencies is not ruled out municipal. The electronic locks installed are of the SALTO KS brand, which require a cloud platform that allows access to be administered remotely, flexibly and securely, without the need to install any local software on the City Council's computers, beyond the corresponding mobile application for users. This SaaS model is chosen for the following reasons: • Access via web browser without the need for any local installation. • Maintenance, updates and support are included in the service. • Technical and functional scalability. • Cost reduction infrastructure and internal technical support. • Greater agility in start-up. This platform is accessed under a license for a service in the SaaS mode. The locks installed are from the SALTO KS MEDIUM brand, which has a proprietary software that exclusively allows the ad hoc management of the installation and its devices.. Tender Value: 1119.71. Currency: EUR. Published Date: 2025-10-24. Closing Date: 2025-11-09. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: COUNCIL OF L'ARBOC

The electronic locks installed are of the SALTO KS brand, which require a cloud platform that allows access to be administered remotely, flexibly and securely, without the need to install any local software on the City Council's computers, beyond the corresponding mobile application for users. This SaaS model is chosen for the following reasons: • Access via web browser without the need for any local installation. • Maintenance, updates and support are included in the service. • Technical and functional scalability. • Cost reduction infrastructure and internal technical support. • Greater agility in start-up. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: TOWN COUNCIL OF SANT CUGAT DEL VALLÈS. Summary: Migration of the City Council'S Computing Platform to a Hosted Data Center.. Description: Description of the service: The object of the contract, in accordance with the explanatory memorandum, consists of: • Supply of the computing platform and tasks associated with its deployment: o Design, delivery and commissioning of the infrastructure technology necessary for the deployment of corporate computing services, including the base software and the migration of the Data Processing Center (CPD) to a data center that meets the criteria of the Technical Specifications (PPT). oAdaptation and configuration tasks of the delivered infrastructure, both at the supplier-s CPDs and at the Sant Cugat del Vallès Town Council. oRemoval of the current hardware to be replaced by the new infrastructure. oGeneration and delivery of the inventory of servers, network elements and hardware, as well as their integration into the corporate CMDB, according to the defined technical requirements.•Services associated with the operation of the new platform: oHosting and maintenance of the infrastructure during the duration of the contract.. Tender Value: 1460000.00. Currency: EUR. Published Date: 2025-10-24. Closing Date: 2025-11-24. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Migration of the City Council'S Computing Platform to a Hosted Data Center.
